data.title: PCI Section 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls
PCI Section 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components
data.phrase:
dataset = endpoints
| fields endpoint_name, assigned_extensions_policy, assigned_prevention_policy
| filter assigned_extensions_policy = "Windows Default"
| comp count() as COMPLIANT_POLICY 
| alter x = "x"
| join conflict_strategy = both (dataset = endpoints
| fields endpoint_name, assigned_extensions_policy, assigned_prevention_policy
| filter assigned_extensions_policy != "Windows Default"
| comp count () as NON_COMPLIANT_POLICY | alter y = "x") as a a.y = x
| fields - x, y
| view graph type = column subtype = stacked header = "Endpoints without compliant policy" xaxis = NON_COMPLIANT_POLICY yaxis = NON_COMPLIANT_POLICY,COMPLIANT_POLICY seriescolor("NON_COMPLIANT_POLICY","#ff0000") seriescolor("COMPLIANT_POLICY","#00a618")

data.title: PCI Section 3: Protect Stored Account Data
data.phrase:
dataset = endpoints 
| filter endpoint_status = ENUM.DISCONNECTED 
| comp count () as disconnected
| alter x = "x"
| join conflict_strategy = both (dataset = endpoints 
| filter endpoint_status = ENUM.CONNECTED
| comp count () as connected | alter y = "x") as a a.y = x
| fields - x, y
| view graph type = column subtype = grouped layout = horizontal header = "Endpoint Connection Status" xaxis = disconnected yaxis = connected,disconnected yaxminrange = 0 yaxmaxrange = 20 seriescolor("connected","#00a618") seriescolor("disconnected","#ff0000")

data.title: PCI Section 4: Protect Cardholder Data with Strong Cryptography During Transmission Over Open, Public Networks
data.phrase:
//No auth data
datamodel | filter xdm.auth.auth_method contains "" |fields xdm.auth.*

data.title: PCI Section 5: Protect All Systems and Networks from Malicious Software
data.phrase:
dataset = incidents 
| filter severity = HIGH
| filter status = ENUM.NEW 
| comp count() as new_incidients
| alter x = "x"
| join conflict_strategy = both (dataset = incidents 
| filter severity = HIGH
| filter status != ENUM.NEW 
| comp count() as new_incidients | alter y = "x") as a a.y = x
| fields - x, y
//| view graph type = gauge subtype = radial header = "New Incidents" yaxis = new_incidients maxscalerange = 12 scale_threshold("#ce6100") 
| view graph type = gauge subtype = radial yaxis = new_incidients maxscalerange = 20 scale_threshold("#e53535","#e8e62f","7","#67bf43","14") dataunit = "New incidents (High Severity)" font = "Arial"

data.title: PCI Section 6: Develop and Maintain Secure Systems and Software
data.phrase: datamodel | filter xdm.observer.product contains "Cortex" | fields xdm.observer.*

data.title: PCI Section 7: Restrict Access to System Components and Cardholder Data by Business Need to Know
PCI Section 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components
data.phrase:
/*datamodel = Auth dataset in(xdr_data)
| filter XDM.Auth.client.host.hostname != null
| fields XDM.Auth.Client.host.hostname, XDM.Auth.Client.host.ipv4_addresses, XDM.Auth.Target.user.username, XDM.Auth.Target.user.identifier, XDM.Auth.Client.port, XDM.Auth.observation_timestamp, XDM.Auth.Client.asn.iana_region, XDM.Auth.Client.location.country as loc_country
| comp count(insert_timestamp) as counter by loc_country
| view graph type = map xaxis = loc_country yaxis = counter default_limit = `false` seriestitle("counter","Volume") */


datamodel | filter xdm.target.location.region contains "" | fields xdm.target.agent.identifier, xdm.target.asn.as_name, xdm.target.asn.as_number, xdm.target.host.fqdn, xdm.target.ipv4, xdm.target.location.city, xdm.target.location.continent, xdm.target.location.country, xdm.target.location.latitude, xdm.target.location.longitude , xdm.target.location.region

data.title: PCI Section 9: Restrict Physical Access to Cardholder Data
PCI Section 10: Log and Monitor All Access to System Components and Cardholder Data
PCI Section 11: Test Security of Systems and Networks Regularly
PCI Section 12: Support Information Security with Organizational Policies and Programs
data.phrase:
dataset = endpoints
| fields endpoint_name, assigned_extensions_policy, assigned_prevention_policy
